text: Shawinigan is a city on the Saint-Maurice River in Quebec, Canada. In 2021, 49,620 people lived there. Michel Angers was elected as mayor in the 2009 municipal election. The name of the city has also been spelled different over periods of time: Chaouinigane, Oshaouinigane, Assaouinigane, Achawénégan, Chawinigame, Shawenigane, Chaouénigane and could either mean "portage", "portage of beeches", "angular portage" or "summit" or "crest". ==Famous residents== *Jean Chrétien, 20th Prime Minister of Canada *Jacques Plante, Former ice hockey goaltender == References == == Other websites == *City of Shawinigan - Official city website Category:Cities and towns in Quebec
title: Shawinigan
